body: MFs below debating how to cook chicken on a hentai site
You have to season chicken. It's a dry meat, the seasonings and preparation is what makes it good.

I think you'd rather eat seasoned chicken than regular old chicken. Normal chicken tastes like shit, which is why it's seasoned. When you fry something, you also give it better taste. Seasoning is the difference between bland as hell and tasty as heaven.
Seasoning is what makes everything taste better, if not you'd be eating bland food every day. Salt is considered seasoning as well, ya know.
I don’t like chicken tho i prefer cow or pork I’m partial to fish hmm never mind I like chicken nuggets but those are more about the texture than the flavor so why would I care about seasoning lmao
The guy below eats chicken without seasoning, but he'd repost it five times in order to try and get the ability to season chicken again.
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me
